originalText.text: Dr. Sullivan was my cardiologist for many, many years. When I lost my job and my insurance I had to stop seeing her. She was the best. She listened and made sure you understood everything that was happening to you. She even once got into a taxi and took me to the emergency room and made sure I didn’t have to sit and wait to be treated. I miss seeing her and having her be my cardiologist. I do not have words to describe how good she is.

originalText.text:
Dr  Margaret Sullivan is a Top Doctor.  She is 100% the BEST!
She is kind and caring with love for her patients.  She saved my husband's life.  She is truly the Greatest Cardiologist at Lenox Hill.  Nobody is better in medicine and patient care than Dr. Sullivan!  We love her!

text.text:
Dr  Margaret Sullivan is a Top Doctor.  She is 100% the BEST!
She is kind and caring with love for her patients.  She saved my husband's life.  She is truly the Greatest Cardiologist at Lenox Hill.  Nobody is better in medicine and patient care than Dr. Sullivan!  We love her!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Dr Margaret Sullivan. I went to see her after having recently been hospitalized at an ER for a hypertensive urgency. She was very thorough and meticulous in her examation as well as very caring. She followed a comprehensive protocol. She also recommended me other specialists, and is following my health evolution. The front desk staff, Theodora, was very friendly and professionnal. There was no wait time, and the practice was very clean.

originalText.text: Best Cardiologist I’ve Had And I’ve Had Quite A Few In My Life. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
